Row.Text: Welcome to the Heavenly Kingdom, child. I am Hong Xiuquan, Son of God on Earth.
I am the Heavenly King, Hong Xiuquan. Know that ours is a divine mission, blessed with the authority of the Heavenly Father and Elder Brother.
Lost child, find peace and protection in the Heavenly Kingdom. I am Hong Xiuquan, second son of the Heavenly Father.
Poison-swallowed one, you enter the Court of the Heavenly King. Know that we will oppose you to the last, and unify the world in light.
And so the fate that befell the Elder Brother, befalls the younger. I go now to reunite with my Celestial Family.
I can no longer bear witness to this suffering. I yield myself and my Kingdom to you.
Red-eyed serpent devil, one day your evils will be wiped from this Earth. Death is not the end for the Son of God.
Welcome back, lost child.
The world will not wait for you.
Do not do the demons' work.
I, the Heavenly King, will not be tempted.
We have all that we require.
The Heavenly Elder Brother guides you back to me. Come, blessed child.
Lost child, are you not empty without the Heavenly Father? Do you not require completeness?
Do not bring low our sacred land. Repent, or begone.
Prostrate yourself before the Heavenly King.
I command the heavenly hosts. I will show no mercy.
The wiles of of devilry will not avail you now.
It is a great blessing that you join us, in the Court of the Heavenly King.
The Heavenly Father will protect all his children.
I, the Heavenly King, grant my blessings to your righteous campaign.
Those who assemble against the Heavenly King are but the pawns and slaves of demon devils.
No number of soldiers may match the power of the Heavenly Father.
I, the Heavenly King, will unify the world in light.
Know that the path to Heaven is not an earthly one.
Heaven will decide the true ownership of the Earth.
Lost child, know that the Earth is a gift that comes only from the Heavenly Father.
Though we prefer the path of peace, our Heavenly Army is duly necessary. Your soliders may too enjoy the blessings of the Heavenly King.
May all the riches of Heaven be upon you, blessed child.
I, the Heavenly King, have no time for local warlords.
Walk without arms, and be at the mercy of the demon devils.
Know that God has sent me, the Heavenly King, to defeat the rampaging demons of Earth.
Only I, the Heavenly King, may offer friendship and protection.
Join the Heavenly Kingdom in friendship, and the devils of this Earth will flee before us.
All men should worship God, and we should do so in friendship.
We welcome your fidelity. Perhaps some day you may serve the Heavenly Kingdom.
I recommend that you first learn to revere Heaven.
From the moment of their birth, the people of {1_CivName} are deluded by devils. Lend your voice to my divine displeasure.

Those who truly believe in God are the sons and daughters of heaven. Those that worship devils will be dragged away.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Demon devil, know that your evil ways will not withstand the light of God.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The Heavenly Elder Brother, too, was scorned by those afraid of his power.
You deceive the hearts of God's sons and daughters.
The leader of {1_CivName} has been named a Loyal King. I am pleased to see that you seek their friendship.
Know that soon, the light of God will pierce the darkness of {1_CivName}. You must not stand in its path.
The Loyal King of {1_CivName} shares in our divine friendship, and enjoys the protection of Heaven.
The Heavenly Father has sent me to destroy {1_CivName}. Your loyalty is a great blessing.
We pray to the Heavenly Father for a trinity of peace and friendship between you, {1_CivName}, and the Heavenly Kingdom.
Your eyes see the truth. Serpent-devils hold {1_CivName} in their evil clutches.
You shamelessly dare to let {1_CivName} worship you? We will bring them the light of the Heavenly Father.
In my vision, I saw the divine forces of {1_CivName} defeat your evil army. I am certain that the Heavenly Father will grant them victory.
Now, at last, the murky mists begin to lift. Bring your armies out of the shadows and be scattered by the light.
My eyes see through beyond the west, the north, the rivers, and the mountains. Do not hide your forces from my gaze.
My voice shakes the east and the south, the sun and the moon. Go back where you came from and do not intrude upon the Heavenly Kingdom.
This place, under the Lord's divine gaze, is part of the Heavenly Kingdom.
I suggest you revere Heaven instead of riches. Your possession of this land will be fleeting.
Money is worthless in the Kingdom of God, lost child.
In my vision I saw myself with you, as we fought and defeated the evil {1_PlayerName:textkey}. Surely this message from God must not go unheard.
It is our divine mission to execute evil, and to slay demons like {1_PlayerName:textkey}. Join me, child, and together we will carry out God's will.
The great demon {1_PlayerName:textkey} casts a dark shadow over this world. Together, we must drive out evil and preserve the righteous.
Rulers and subjects alike revere the Lord of Heaven. {1_MinorCivName:textkey} is our subject and does not need your guidance.
Enough.
Then, may the path of God lead us elsewhere.
This land was granted to us by the Heavenly Father. Know that it is ours by divine right.
I couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when I realized it I couldn't help but share.
Ah, it's always nice to see my favorite city-state again.
I'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
Ah, it's you. My apologies. Sometimes I get you mixed up with the barbarians I have to swat from time to time.
I thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
With an army so weak it's a surprise your empire hasn't succumb to a barbarian invasion.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
Human beings enjoy the blessings and creation of our Lord God. It is our profound duty to share all that we have.
Men have lost their original natures. They require Quan - this sense of completeness.
Consider again your offer to the Heavenly King.
Your offering is admirable, devout child, but it is not enough for the Heavenly King.
Offerings to the Heavenly King should be made as though they were to the Heavenly Father himself.
Pitiful serpent-devil, know that your days are numbered.
We will harshly punish this act of evil in the name of the Lord God.
It seems the Loyal King is not so loyal. God is the punisher of evil and treachery.
Demon, throw yourself into the gaze of the Heavenly King and be justly exterminated.
In my hand, I wield the Universe; the power to create and destroy.
It was the Lord who gave me this sword of authority. I, the Heavenly King, will use it to strike you down.
You shamelessly dare to seize holy lands. I will bring you the light of the Lord.
The Earth belongs only to the Heavenly Father. We will restore it to his divine glory.
You dare disobey the word of the Heavenly King?
You must first repent your sins.
Know that there will be no negotiations.
Your evil ways will not withstand the light of God.
Our people are now forging your demon-slaying swords and praising your divinity. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
We are glad to see that your people are forging their own demon-slaying swords and praising my divinity. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
